Gemma Collins continued to show off her incredible weight-loss on Wednesday.

The former TOWIE star, 38, shared a stylish 'outfit of the day' Instagram selfie and flaunted her slimmed down figure.

The reality TV star looked fashionable in a pair of skinny white jeans and a fitted grey jumper, while she lived up to her notorious Diva reputation and shaded her eyes with a pair of oversized heart-shaped sunglasses.

Gemma has lost three stone this year, and she's not been afraid to flaunt her incredible weight loss in recent snaps.

(Image: Instagram)

The queen of memes then posted a hilarious GIF of herself with the phrase: "When someone suggests going spoons for lunch."

The GIF shows an uncontrollably excited Gemma screaming 'yes' and frantically waving her arms around in a dramatic fashion, suggesting she would be thrilled at the idea of going to Weatherspoons for lunch.

The clip contains footage of Gemma during her stint on ITV's Dancing On Ice from the beginning of the year.

Gemma captioned the funny clip: "BUSY DAY for me. 06.45 already at work. This will be me at lunch today..."

(Image: Gemmacollins1Instagram)

Proving her lighthearted personality, the blonde bombshell appeared to make herself the butt of her own joke.

Gemma's latest slimmed down post comes as she has worked hard to maintain her figure after she lost weight following her Dancing On Ice appearance in January.

However, she admitted that she helps keep the pounds off by injecting controversial £250 weight loss jabs .

(Image: Getty)

The reality TV queen recently said: "I definitely feel much better since losing weight and I have got more energy and stuff.

"When you eat rubbish food, you feel rubbish and when you eat healthy, it’s a lot better."

The TV star thanks Skinny Jab for "curbing her appetite" and maintaining her slimmer shape.

Meanwhile, Gemma also recently revealed that she knows she's got magical abilities because her breasts "get heavy" during the full moon.

(Image: PA)

The TOWIE veteran detailed her special talents during her BBC podcast The Gemma Collins Podcast yesterday.

Gemma declared that she could "see and feel things that others didn't" when she was younger, and now that she's 38, her breasts let her know whenever the moon is full.

She compared herself to powerful fictional youngster Eleven, from the hit Netflix show Stranger Things , who has psychokinetic abilities.

She said: "When I was younger like I didn’t really understand that I could feel things that maybe other people didn't or see things that other people didn't.

"It's only when I watched Stranger Things… now I feel like Millie Bobby Brown and I get it."
description: The Essex diva flaunted her three-stone weight loss before posting a GC meme about being excited for lunchtime
